subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Wayne Rooney and Paul Scholes were ejected as Manchester United lost at Fulham for the first time since 1964, a 2-0 defeat that tightened the Premier League title race.
snippet: Wayne Rooney and Paul Scholes were ejected as Manchester United lost at Fulham for the first time since 1964, a 2-0 defeat that tightened the Premier League title race.
